name: select_contact
description: Select a contact from the contact list.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Which contact do you want to select?'}

name: toggle_filter
description: Toggle between different contact filters (e.g., Phone contacts, Email contacts, Company).
parameters: {'filter_type': 'Which filter do you want to toggle? ["Phone contacts", "Email contacts", "Company"]'}

name: open_search_view
description: Open the search view to search for contacts.

name: close_selected_items
description: Close the contextual toolbar and deselect selected items.

name: open_more_options
description: Open more options for the selected contact.

name: switch_tab
description: Switch to a different tab in the navigation bar.
parameters: {'tab_name': 'Which tab do you want to switch to? ["Contacts", "Highlights", "Fix & manage"]'}

name: set_to_favorites
description: Set the selected contact to favorites.
parameters: {'contact_name': 'Which contact do you want to set to favorites?'}
